title: Foxconn’s Shenzhen factories resume operations after lockdown
desc: Foxconn, the world’s biggest contract manufacturer of electronics, says it’s “basically” resumed normal operations in Shenzhen after a partial lockdown forced its factories offline. Its Longhua and Guanlan factories are impacted.
